General.Name: Arena Star Group Ltd
General.Description: Arena Star Group Ltd. engages in the real estate activities in Israel and Kazakhstan. The company is involved in the initiating, establishing, purchasing, renting, managing, and maintaining malls and commercial centers; provision of management services to the tenants of the commercial units in the shopping centers and malls; and holding of other real estate assets. The company was formerly known as Israel Financial Levers (IFL) Ltd. and changed its name to Arena Star Group Ltd. in August 2014. Arena Star Group Ltd. was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
